ack.p: We are grateful to Professor Ron A. M. Fouchier and Dr. John McCauley for providing the H5N1 and H7N9 viruses, respectively. The following reagent was obtained through BEI Resources, NIAID, NIH: Monoclonal Anti-Influenza A Virus H7 Hemagglutinin (HA) Protein, A/Netherlands/219/2003 (H7N7), Clone AT241.375.173 (produced in vitro), NR-48980. We thank our technical assistants Johanna Rintamäki, Teija Aalto, Nina Aho, Svetlana Kaijalainen, and especially Hanna Valtonen and Riitta Santanen for assistance in BSL-3 work, and we appreciate the help from the biosafety officer Susanna Sissonen at THL. We also thank our trainees Riia Järvi and Olga Jänisniemi for their assistance in laboratory work.
